description: Pangeo Forge is an open source platform for the curation of analysis-ready, cloud-optimized scientific datasets. We are using Pangeo Forge to populate a multi-petabyte-scale open-access library of scientific data in the cloud. You will leave this talk with a clear understanding of how to access this data library, craft your own Pangeo Forge recipe, and become a contributor to our growing “recipe box.”
title: Pangeo Forge: Crowdsourcing Open Data in the Cloud
